name: Lawn Mower Simulator Rush: A Day on the Family Farm
name_original: Lawn Mower Simulator Rush: A Day on the Family Farm
description:
Do you like interactive high speed puzzle games? Then you've got to check out this wild and crazy lawnmower game!

Mow your way around the backyard at crazy speeds. Be sure to dodge the many obstacles like furniture, swimming pools, critters & much more.

Do you think you have what it takes to master this fun and addicting game?

Features:
* Great for All Ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
